bioghist.p: Harold Norris was a Detroit attorney and professor at the Detroit College of Law. In addition, he was Democratic delegate to the Michigan Constitutional Convention, 1961-1962, and was an officer of the National Lawyers Guild.

scopecontent.p: The bulk of the collection concerns Norris' work as an officer with the National Lawyers Guild and as a delegate to the Michigan Constitutional Convention, 1961-1962.
